flowchart TD %% Use Case Flow Layer A[User Input: Enter URL] --> B[Step 1: Receive URL] B --> C[Step 2: Validate Format] C --> D[Step 3: Check Accessibility] D --> E[Step 4: Security Screening] E --> F[Success: URL Validated] %% Architecture Components Layer B -.-> B1[Input Validator
Load Balancer
API Gateway] C -.-> C1[Regex Engine
Validation Cache
Pattern Matcher] D -.-> D1[HTTP Client
Connection Pool
Circuit Breaker] E -.-> E1[Security Service
Blacklist Database
Malware Scanner] F -.-> F1[Response Handler
Audit Logger
Result Cache] %% Non-Functional Requirements B1 -.-> NF1[Performance: <200ms
Scalability: 1000 req/sec] C1 -.-> NF2[Performance: <50ms
Reliability: 99.9%] D1 -.-> NF3[Performance: 5s timeout
Reliability: Retry logic] E1 -.-> NF4[Security: 100% screening
Compliance: Threat detection] F1 -.-> NF5[Audit: Complete logging
Monitoring: Success metrics] %% Styling class A,B,C,D,E,F usecase class B1,C1,D1,E1,F1 components class NF1,NF2,NF3,NF4,NF5 requirements
